title: Report Discolored Water
description: A customer calls to report that their tap water is brown.

tasks.description: Identify the customer's location and ask if their neighbors are experiencing the same issue.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gathers location and scope information.

tasks.description: Check for any recent operational activities in the area, such as water main flushing or repairs, that could stir up sediment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds that a nearby water main was flushed earlier in the day.

tasks.description: Advise the customer that the discoloration is temporary due to the flushing and to run their cold water taps for a few minutes until it clears.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a clear explanation and instructions to resolve the issue.
